# Generated by PWGenPrj
# Generated date: __PWTEMPLATE_DATE__

include(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../config/config.cmake)
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0)
project(__PWTEMPLATE_NAME__.src CXX)
include(FindPkgConfig)

pkg_search_module(PW REQUIRED pw)

# Configure your binary file name
set(TARGET __PWTEMPLATE_NAME__)

add_executable(${TARGET}
	main.cpp
	mycommon.cpp
)

add_definitions(${PW_CFLAGS})

target_link_libraries(${TARGET} ${PW_LIBRARIES})

# Install target to bin/__PWTEMPLATE_NAME__/
install(TARGETS ${TARGET} RUNTIME DESTINATION ${INST_PREFIX})

include(CPack)
